aboutMe.title: Work Philosophy
aboutMe.description: My way of working is based on a simple idea: doing things with care and intention. I give as much importance to the code as to the clarity of exchanges, to the quality of the user experience as to the satisfaction of my collaborators. These principles guide me every day to design projects that are both reliable, elegant and human.

passion.title: My Passion
passion.description: Beyond my professional skills, I am passionate about technology and its impact on our daily lives. I love exploring new innovations, understanding how they work and imagining how they can improve our world. This passion drives me to constantly learn and stay up-to-date with the latest trends in the tech world.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you are interested in my profile and would like to discuss collaboration opportunities, feel free to contact me. I would be delighted to discuss with you about my skills, my projects and my passions. You can reach me by email or via my social networks below.
